name: Dreaming of a Priestess (Demo)
description:
Klonoa needs your help! He needs help to date Lolo. Either help him...or sabotage his date. It's up to you!

Credit to the companies who made the game characters included in this game. Also credit to the people who ripped the sprites from the respective games

The sprites were from either wikis or the spriters resource. 

Credit to the people who made some of the songs included in this game. These also come from different games.
